definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Is the dressing ready to take on the week?
sentences.chinese: 是否已经为了周中的比赛整装带发？

sentences.english: They're each trying to shed 5kg during the 8-week get-fit camp.
sentences.chinese: 他们要在这8周中每日至少减重5公斤。

sentences.english: One institution that got it right for the cluttered art-week was the Whitney Museum of American Art.
sentences.chinese: 惠特尼博物馆就在混乱的艺术展周中找准了自己位置。

sentences.english: After mid-week a recent series of workplace or financial mistakes will be easily resolved.
sentences.chinese: 周中之后，最近的一些工作或财务错误将很容易解决。

sentences.english: All three came through a Reserve team run-out in midweek.
sentences.chinese: 这三人都参加了周中的预备队比赛。

definition: Málaga, Spain/Malaga city in Iranian East Azerbaijan
La Coruña or A Coruña (city in Galicia, Spain)
La Liga, the top division of the Spanish football league system

pinyin: La1 si1 pa4 er3 ma3 si1

definition: Napoli, capital of Campania region of Italy/Naples
Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
